mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At ZenShe Spa, we create a sacred space where every woman can reconnect with her feminine essence and restore her natural balance.

feminine_wellness.description: We specialize in treatments dedicated to intimate wellness and feminine fulfillment.

holistic_approach.title: Holistic Approach
holistic_approach.description: Our treatments combine ancestral traditions and modern techniques for complete care of body and spirit.

excellence_discretion.title: Excellence & Discretion

labels.anatomyType: From a medical point of view, what type of anatomy were you born with?
labels.reproductiveOrgans: Which of the following reproductive organs did you have at birth?
labels.anatomyModified: Has your genital anatomy been modified since birth due to voluntary or medical surgery or intervention?
labels.steamExperience: What is your experience with perineal steaming?
labels.mainConcern: What is the main concern you would like to address?
labels.initialsConfirmation: My initials below confirm that I have received a copy of the Recommendations before the steaming session

questions.q32_0: Are you currently on your period or having fresh spotting that is bright red in color?
questions.q32_1: Have you had light fresh blood loss in the last 24 hours?
questions.q32_2: Have you had heavy spontaneous bleeding in the last 3 months?
questions.q32_3: Have you had two menstrual cycles per month (i.e., a cycle every 19 days or less) in the last 3 months?
questions.q33_1: Is there a possibility that you are pregnant?
questions.q33_2: If you are undergoing fertility treatment, have you already ovulated or received a transfer (IUI/IVF)?
questions.q34_0: Have you had tubal coagulation (burning of the fallopian tubes by laparoscopy via the navel)?
questions.q34_1: Do you have a contraceptive implant in your arm or a patch (e.g., Nexplanon)?
questions.q34_2: Have you had endometrial ablation (procedure where the walls of the uterus are burned to cause scarring)?
questions.q34_3: Are you less than 6 weeks from surgery?
questions.q34_4: Have you had uterine fibroid embolization?
questions.q34_5: Are you wearing a contraceptive vaginal ring (NuvaRing type)?
questions.q36_0: Do you have a genital or rectal infection accompanied by a burning sensation?
questions.q40_0: Are your menstrual cycles currently, or have they ever been in the past, 27 days or less?
questions.q40_1: Do you have a history of spontaneous bleeding or two menstrual cycles per month (3 months or more in the past)?
questions.q42_0: Have you had hot flashes in the last month?
questions.q42_1: Have you had night sweats in the last month?
questions.q42_2: Do you currently have, or have you ever had in the past, vaginal yeast infections?
questions.q42_3: Do you currently have, or have you ever had in the past, bacterial vaginosis?
questions.q42_4: Do you currently have, or have you ever had in the past, urinary tract infections (bladder infections)?
questions.q42_5: Do you have active or dormant herpes?
